channel.title: How do i play the game?
channel.description: how do i play the game it saids that i need to make my own server how do i do that??? plz help me!!! :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 10:27:44 AM[/size][hr]and what does UID mean???

item.title: How do i play the game?
item.dc:creator: @l_m_a_o1 l m a o
item.description:
@l_m_a_o1 wrote:

ok well this seems easy enough to help out with, first off check you have the right port you can do this by clicking on file in the mopar client, and then click on change port, then put in the port number.
next type in a username and password, and put in the server ip, you can get this info at server advertisement, then if it still doesnt work either its down or its hamachi, heres a link to a downloadable hamachi : https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp
youre only going to need hamachi if the ip is a bunch of numbers like:5.169.224.25(just an example)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i play the game?
